Renamed special lists and smart new tasks

We've renamed the two features with unclear names:

The new name for the „special lists“ is „meta lists“.
The new name for the „semantic new tasks“ is „task template“

We hope, that the new names are more clear and more intuitive.

750px is not enough

We should use dp (in the future) instead of px
Some more Fixes for RTL, should be ready now
